name: Logistics Manager (Abbott Diabetes Care)
description:
For 130 years Abbott is a global healthcare leader that helps people live more fully at all stages of life. Our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare, with leading businesses and products in diagnostics, minimally invasive medical devices, coronary stents, nutritionals and branded generic medicines. We help people with diabetes effectively manage it without painful finger pricks.
Abbott is one of the most diversified companies in healthcare. Our 109,000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countries.

At Abbott, we believe people with diabetes should have the freedom to enjoy vigorous, active lives. Our systems help people with diabetes manage their health more effectively and comfortably with easy-to-use products that provide accurate data to drive better informed decisions.

We are looking for Logistics Manager.

Major Accountabilities:

To drive Best in Class (BIC) supply chain management:

  • To drive replenishment strategy for multi-channel business and own Supply Chain management (incl. inventory management) processes including monthly/weekly/daily activities to support optimal inventory levels, to track performance
  • To run regular Rough-Cut Capacity Planning with logistics/ WH/Services providers, anticipate what-if scenarios and prepare response plan including partnering with Logistics/WH providers
  • To own Budgeting process for Logistics/WH areas
  • To run Import Logistics activities to ensure product availability, optimal inventory
  • To support new channels/products launches from Supply Chain point of view

To optimize supply chain/delivery services

  • To run full project management life cycle for Supply Chain optimization projects (feasibility check, business case defense, implementation, hyper care)
  • To drive customer-centric improvements in Supply Chain/Delivery Services

To collaborate with Logistics/WH partners internally and externally to build effective supply chain

  • To own and revise Business concept/SLA ownership with Logistics/WH providers
  • To run regular Rough-Cut Capacity Planning assessment with logistics/ WH/Services providers
  • To create and run Joint value creation business plan (with both providers)
  • To drive Loss Analysis in Logistics/WH area to support ADC with Cost/Cash optimization

Requirements:

  • Education: Master's degree preferably in Engineering / Economics / Management / Finance
  • Years of experience, both overall and any industry-specific experience needed: from 6 years of experience, min 2 years with industry-specific experience
  • Solid Supply Chain management experience in international supply chains and new product/channels launch experience is a must
  • Project management experience: practical examples are needed
  • Experience of relationships management with external parties (ex: Suppliers, Customers, Logistics providers, etc.)
  • Systems fluency is a must (SAP)
  • Excel mastery is a must
  • Strategic thinking and ability to think ahead on building pipeline of strategic projects
  • Other qualifications/certifications: fluent English is essential; E-commerce apps (Magento, Adobe Experience Manager) will be a plus
